Subfunction of evUHFSenden.

Function is used to store CRC at the end of the UHF message depending on which bit in last byte of payload is used.
Triggerd by evUHFSenden
N/A
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous
uint16
last_Byte_bits_used - indicates how many bits of a last byte were used [in] uint16 bytecnt - byte counter [in] uint16* crc_result - pointer to CRC result
Std_ReturnType RTE Status Globals

memberdef.name: checkByteAndPrepareMessageUHF

detaileddescription.para: Function used inside evUHFSenden - checking and preparing UHF Message to SAM.

Function checks counter of a bytes. If it is greater than the limit then content of the prepared message is set with zeros otherwise prepareMessageSevenBytesUHF is called.
Triggered in evUHFSenden
N/A
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous
uint64*
msg - pointer to a message [in] uint16* byteCntLimit - given bytes counter limit [in] uint16 bytecn - given bytes counter [in] uint16 offset - offset of bytes when choosing a message
void Globals
N/A Input->Output-Correlation
N/A Activity Diagram checkByteAndPrepareMessageUHF
